entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bay Roberts

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10 except minus 6 along parts of the coast. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10 except minus 6 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023
